author: cezar
msg: Added XMLStreamReaderExt an extention of XMLStreamReader which alowes getting strongly typed java values from a stream, like: boolean, int, short, byte, float, double, base64bin, hexBin, QNames and various date formats.
CR: Scott
DRT: passes

author: davidbau
msg: Fix a classpath problem with BindingFile when running under ant.
We run into this problem so often that it should be a "FAQ"...
But maybe it's just us because we write xbean code that runs
under ant.
Anyway, when running under "ant" you have to be careful to use a
classloader that includes your schema types because "ant"
substitutes a thread context classloader that typically
does NOT.
Code review: sending to pcal for review
Regression tests: ant drt passed

author: pcal
